text: Yara tadera prabhura prati sara deya tadera jan'ya rayeche kalyana, ara yara tamra prati sara deya na -- tadera yadi thakata prthibite ya-kichu ache sabata'i o se'i sange tara samaparimana, tabe tara niscaya'i ta muktipanarupe arpana karato. Era'i -- edera jan'ya habe manda hisaba, ara tadera abasa habe jahannama, ara ta bara nikrsta basasthana.
